thread.title: Kaley Cuoco’s ex ‘seeking spousal support’
thread.title_full: Kaley Cuoco’s ex ‘seeking spousal support’ - Bangalore Mirror

author: bangaloremirror.com
title: Kaley Cuoco’s ex ‘seeking spousal support’
text:
The Big Bang Theory actress Kaley Cuoco's estranged husband Ryan Sweeting has reportedly asked for spousal support in response to her divorce request last month.
The 28-year-old tennis player wants the actress, 29, to fork out monthly maintenance in response to her divorce request, according to the court documents obtained by Entertainment Tonight. Cuoco, believed to be worth approximately USD 45 million, filed for divorce from the sportsman last month citing "irreconcilable differences" as the reason for their split.
The couple signed a pre-nuptial agreement one month before their marriage on December 31, 2013 and she has listed their date of separation as September 3, 2015.
Her divorce filing states that property and spousal support information is detailed in the pre-nuptial agreement.
